params.blocks: [ 		{ 			"type": "section", 			"text": { 				"type": "mrkdwn", 				"text": "A FortiSOAR playbook is requesting your input." 			} 		}, 		{ 			"type": "section", 			"text": { 				"type": "plain_text", 				"text": " Please provide your input using the following link:<https://{{vars.input.record.server_fqhn | ternary(vars.input.record.server_fqhn, globalVars.Server_fqhn)}}/{{vars.input.record.agent_id | ternary('', 'input')}}?inputId={{vars.input.record.id}}&token={{vars.input.record.token}} | Open input form>" 			} 		}, 		{ 			"type": "section", 			"text": { 				"type": "plain_text", 				"text": "Alternatively, copy/paste this in your browser:" 			} 		}, 		{ 			"type": "section", 			"text": { 				"type": "plain_text", 				"text": "https://{{vars.input.record.server_fqhn | ternary(vars.input.record.server_fqhn, globalVars.Server_fqhn)}}/{{vars.input.record.agent_id | ternary('', 'input')}}?inputId={{vars.input.record.id}}&token={{vars.input.record.token}}" 			} 		}, 		{ 			"type": "section", 			"text": { 				"type": "plain_text", 				"text": "Regards," 			} 		}, 		{ 			"type": "section", 			"text": { 				"type": "plain_text", 				"text": "FortiSOAR Admin." 			} 		} 	]
